member.name: M:SWICFFITests.SWICFFITestsWindows.ShowWindow(System.IntPtr,SWICFFITests.WindowShowStyle)
member.summary: Enumeration of the different ways of showing a window using ShowWindow

member.name: F:SWICFFITests.SWICFFITestsWindows.BITMAPINFO.bmiHeader
member.summary: A BITMAPINFOHEADER structure that contains information about the dimensions of color format.

member.name: F:SWICFFITests.SWICFFITestsWindows.BITMAPINFO.bmiColors
member.summary: An array of RGBQUAD. The elements of the array that make up the color table.

member.name: F:SWICFFITests.WindowShowStyle.Hide
member.summary: Hides the window and activates another window.

member.name: F:SWICFFITests.WindowShowStyle.ShowNormal
member.summary: Activates and displays a window. If the window is minimized or maximized, the system restores it to its original size and position. An application should specify this flag when displaying the window for the first time.

member.name: F:SWICFFITests.WindowShowStyle.ShowMinimized
member.summary: Activates the window and displays it as a minimized window.

member.name: F:SWICFFITests.WindowShowStyle.ShowMaximized
member.summary: Activates the window and displays it as a maximized window.

member.name: F:SWICFFITests.WindowShowStyle.Maximize
member.summary: Maximizes the specified window.

member.name: F:SWICFFITests.WindowShowStyle.ShowNormalNoActivate
member.summary: Displays a window in its most recent size and position. This value is similar to "ShowNormal", except the window is not actived.

member.name: F:SWICFFITests.WindowShowStyle.Show
member.summary: Activates the window and displays it in its current size and position.

member.name: F:SWICFFITests.WindowShowStyle.Minimize
member.summary: Minimizes the specified window and activates the next top-level window in the Z order.

member.name: F:SWICFFITests.WindowShowStyle.ShowMinNoActivate
member.summary: Displays the window as a minimized window. This value is similar to "ShowMinimized", except the window is not activated.

member.name: F:SWICFFITests.WindowShowStyle.ShowNoActivate
member.summary: Displays the window in its current size and position. This value is similar to "Show", except the window is not activated.

member.name: F:SWICFFITests.WindowShowStyle.Restore
member.summary: Activates and displays the window. If the window is minimized or maximized, the system restores it to its original size and position. An application should specify this flag when restoring a minimized window.

member.name: F:SWICFFITests.WindowShowStyle.ShowDefault
member.summary: Sets the show state based on the SW_ value specified in the STARTUPINFO structure passed to the CreateProcess function by the program that started the application.

member.name: F:SWICFFITests.WindowShowStyle.ForceMinimized
member.summary: Windows 2000/XP: Minimizes a window, even if the thread that owns the window is hung. This flag should only be used when minimizing windows from a different thread.

member.name: T:SWICFFITests.AVISTREAMINFO
member.summary: Structure, which contains information for a single stream .

member.name: F:SWICFFITests.AVISTREAMINFO.type
member.summary: Four-character code indicating the stream type.

member.name: F:SWICFFITests.AVISTREAMINFO.handler
member.summary: Four-character code of the compressor handler that will compress this video stream when it is saved.

member.name: F:SWICFFITests.AVISTREAMINFO.flags
member.summary: Applicable flags for the stream.

member.name: F:SWICFFITests.AVISTREAMINFO.Capabilities
member.summary: Capability flags; currently unused.

member.name: F:SWICFFITests.AVISTREAMINFO.priority
member.summary: Priority of the stream.

member.name: F:SWICFFITests.AVISTREAMINFO.language
member.summary: Language of the stream.

member.name: F:SWICFFITests.AVISTREAMINFO.scale
member.summary: Time scale applicable for the stream.
member.remarks: Dividing rate by scale gives the playback rate in number of samples per second.

member.name: F:SWICFFITests.AVISTREAMINFO.rate
member.summary: Rate in an integer format.

member.name: F:SWICFFITests.AVISTREAMINFO.start
member.summary: Sample number of the first frame of the AVI file.

member.name: F:SWICFFITests.AVISTREAMINFO.length
member.summary: Length of this stream.
member.remarks: The units are defined by rate and scale.

member.name: F:SWICFFITests.AVISTREAMINFO.initialFrames
member.summary: Audio skew. This member specifies how much to skew the audio data ahead of the video frames in interleaved files.

member.name: F:SWICFFITests.AVISTREAMINFO.suggestedBufferSize
member.summary: Recommended buffer size, in bytes, for the stream.

member.name: F:SWICFFITests.AVISTREAMINFO.quality
member.summary: Quality indicator of the video data in the stream.
member.remarks: Quality is represented as a number between 0 and 10,000.

member.name: F:SWICFFITests.AVISTREAMINFO.sampleSize
member.summary: Size, in bytes, of a single data sample.

member.name: F:SWICFFITests.AVISTREAMINFO.rectFrame
member.summary: Dimensions of the video destination rectangle.

member.name: F:SWICFFITests.AVISTREAMINFO.editCount
member.summary: Number of times the stream has been edited.

member.name: F:SWICFFITests.AVISTREAMINFO.formatChangeCount
member.summary: Number of times the stream format has changed.

member.name: F:SWICFFITests.AVISTREAMINFO.name
member.summary: Description of the stream.

member.name: T:SWICFFITests.AVICOMPRESSOPTIONS
member.summary: Structure, which contains information about a stream and how it is compressed and saved.

member.name: F:SWICFFITests.AVICOMPRESSOPTIONS.type
member.summary: Four-character code indicating the stream type.

member.name: F:SWICFFITests.AVICOMPRESSOPTIONS.handler
member.summary: Four-character code for the compressor handler that will compress this video stream when it is saved.

member.name: F:SWICFFITests.AVICOMPRESSOPTIONS.keyFrameEvery
member.summary: Maximum period between video key frames.

member.name: F:SWICFFITests.AVICOMPRESSOPTIONS.quality
member.summary: Quality value passed to a video compressor.

member.name: F:SWICFFITests.AVICOMPRESSOPTIONS.bytesPerSecond
member.summary: Video compressor data rate.

member.name: F:SWICFFITests.AVICOMPRESSOPTIONS.flags
member.summary: Flags used for compression.

member.name: F:SWICFFITests.AVICOMPRESSOPTIONS.format
member.summary: Pointer to a structure defining the data format.

member.name: F:SWICFFITests.AVICOMPRESSOPTIONS.formatSize
member.summary: Size, in bytes, of the data referenced by format.

member.name: F:SWICFFITests.AVICOMPRESSOPTIONS.parameters
member.summary: Video-compressor-specific data; used internally.

member.name: F:SWICFFITests.AVICOMPRESSOPTIONS.parametersSize
member.summary: Size, in bytes, of the data referenced by parameters.

member.name: F:SWICFFITests.AVICOMPRESSOPTIONS.interleaveEvery
member.summary: Interleave factor for interspersing stream data with data from the first stream.
